record.dc:title: 21McL12, 15McL12, McLean, Kentucky. Kirkland Site. Section of the R-3 Profile.
record.wpa:narrative: This photograph is taken from the southeast of the R-3 profile which runs north and south. Loaded above and behind the profile is the dirt-pile. Embraced within the photograph are the extremities of the 100 and 130' lines. Indicated is the plowline which has an average depth of .5', the Habitation Level having an averate depth of 1.1', and beneath, the undisturbed yellow clay. All lying above the lowest line represents the accumulation of middn laden soil as a result of aboriginal occupation.
